text: unhen pukaaro, unake baapon se sambandhit karake, ye adhik nyaay kee baat hai allaah ke sameep aur yadi tum nahin jaanate unake baapon ko, to ve tumhaare dharm bandhu tatha mitr hain aur tumhaare oopar koee dosh nahin hai usamen, jo tumase chook huee hai, parantu (usamen hai) jisaka nishchay tumhaare dil karen tatha allaah ati kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hai
